summary:
- **Grant of Rights**: 426,401 performance-based Rights issued to Eligible Participants (employees/contractors) under GDG Rights Plan (30 June 2025 grant date).  
- **Vesting Conditions**:  
  - **262,004 Rights**: Subject to 3-year iTSR (50%) and EPS growth CAGR (50%) targets (1 July 2025 – 30 June 2028).  
  - **41,099 Rights**: Subject to 3-year annuities FUM target.  
  - **123,298 Rights**: Subject to 3-year Generation Life normalised EBIT growth CAGR.  
- **Settlement**: May be in shares or cash (Board discretion). No voting/dividend rights.  
- **Change of Control**: Accelerated vesting formula applied (50% + performance-based adjustment).
